trans-unit.source: Send email using SendGrid | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Send email using SendGrid | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the SendGrid service to send email from your Azure Mobile Services app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the SendGrid service to send email from your Azure Mobile Services app.

trans-unit.source: Send email from Mobile Services with SendGrid
trans-unit.target: Send email from Mobile Services with SendGrid

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how can add email functionality to your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how can add email functionality to your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial you add server side scripts to send email using SendGrid.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial you add server side scripts to send email using SendGrid.

trans-unit.source: When complete, your mobile service will send an email each time a record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: When complete, your mobile service will send an email each time a record is inserted.

trans-unit.source: SendGrid is a [cloud-based email service] that provides reliable [transactional email delivery], scalability, and real-time analytics along with flexible APIs that make custom integration easy.
trans-unit.target: SendGrid is a [cloud-based email service] that provides reliable [transactional email delivery], scalability, and real-time analytics along with flexible APIs that make custom integration easy.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <http://sendgrid.com>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <http://sendgrid.com>.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to enable email functionality:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to enable email functionality:

trans-unit.source: [Create a SendGrid account]
trans-unit.target: [Create a SendGrid account]

trans-unit.source: [Add a script to send email]
trans-unit.target: [Add a script to send email]

trans-unit.source: [Insert data to receive email]
trans-unit.target: [Insert data to receive email]

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the Mobile Services quickstart.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the Mobile Services quickstart.

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete [Get started with Mobile Services].
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete [Get started with Mobile Services].

trans-unit.source: Create a new SendGrid account
trans-unit.target: Create a new SendGrid account

trans-unit.source: Register a new script that sends emails
trans-unit.target: Register a new script that sends emails

trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: In **todoitem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.
trans-unit.target: In **todoitem**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code:

trans-unit.source: Replace the placeholders in the above script with the correct values:
trans-unit.target: Replace the placeholders in the above script with the correct values:

trans-unit.source: **_username_ and _password_**: the SendGrid credentials you identified in [Create a SendGrid account].
trans-unit.target: **_username_ and _password_**: the SendGrid credentials you identified in [Create a SendGrid account].

trans-unit.source: **_email-address_**: the address that the email is sent to.
trans-unit.target: **_email-address_**: the address that the email is sent to.

trans-unit.source: In a real-world app, you can use tables to store and retrieve email addresses.
trans-unit.target: In a real-world app, you can use tables to store and retrieve email addresses.

trans-unit.source: When testing your app, just use your own email address.
trans-unit.target: When testing your app, just use your own email address.

trans-unit.source: **_from-address_**: the address from which the email originates.
trans-unit.target: **_from-address_**: the address from which the email originates.

trans-unit.source: Consider using a registered domain address that belongs to your organization.
trans-unit.target: Consider using a registered domain address that belongs to your organization.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you do not have a registered domain, you can instead use the domain of your Mobile Service, in the format *notifications@_your-mobile-service_.azure-mobile.net*.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you do not have a registered domain, you can instead use the domain of your Mobile Service, in the format *notifications@_your-mobile-service_.azure-mobile.net*.

trans-unit.source: However, messages sent to your mobile service domain are ignored.
trans-unit.target: However, messages sent to your mobile service domain are ignored.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Save** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Save** button.

trans-unit.source: You have now configured a script to send an email each time a record is inserted into the **TodoItem** table.
trans-unit.target: You have now configured a script to send an email each time a record is inserted into the **TodoItem** table.

trans-unit.source: Insert test data to receive email
trans-unit.target: Insert test data to receive email

trans-unit.source: In the client app project, run the quickstart application.
trans-unit.target: In the client app project, run the quickstart application.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows the Windows Store version of the quickstart,
trans-unit.target: This topic shows the Windows Store version of the quickstart,

trans-unit.source: In the app, type text in **Insert a TodoItem**, and then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type text in **Insert a TodoItem**, and then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Notice that you receive an email, such as one shown in the notification below.
trans-unit.target: Notice that you receive an email, such as one shown in the notification below.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, you have successfully configured your mobile service to send email by using SendGrid.
trans-unit.target: Congratulations, you have successfully configured your mobile service to send email by using SendGrid.

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.target: these links to learn more about SendGrid.
